## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed console.logs and commented-out code

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on actual devices (iOS) / browsers (Admin)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated API documentation if applicable

### Database
- [ ] I have created/updated migration files if database changes were made
- [ ] I have tested migrations both up and down
- [ ] I have updated backup scripts if needed

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that all new dependencies are necessary
- [ ] I have updated package.json / Podfile if dependencies changed
- [ ] All dependencies are properly licensed

### Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Sensitive data is not exposed in logs or errors
- [ ] Environment variables are properly handled
- [ ] API endpoints have proper authentication/authorization

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] Database queries are optimized
- [ ] Large files/assets are properly handled
- [ ] Memory leaks have been checked for (iOS)

### Git
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the base branch
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
- [ ] Commit messages follow the conventional commits format
- [ ] I have squashed unnecessary commits
